Ledger Run Partners With Blue Star Innovation Partners to Accelerate Growth

Ledger Run, a leading provider of technology services that optimize workflows, enabling seamless engagement between sponsors, sites, and CROs while enhancing financial management in clinical trials, today announced a partnership with Blue Star Innovation Partners ("BSIP").
